info.title: Azure Cognitive Service for Language
info.description: Azure Cognitive Service for Language, previously known as 'Text Analytics' connector detects language, sentiment and more of the text you provide.

post.description: Returns a list of strings denoting the key talking points in the input text for each document.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The documents to analyze. Documents can contain a language field to indicate the text language.

post.description: Returns the detected language and a numeric score between 0 and 1 for each document. Scores close to 1 indicate 100% certainty that the identified language is true. A total of 120 languages are supported.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The documents to analyze.

post.description: Returns a numeric score between 0 and 1 for each document. Scores close to 1 indicate positive sentiment, while scores close to 0 indicate negative sentiment.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The documents to analyze.

post.description: Returns a list of known entities and general named entities ("Person", "Location", "Organization" etc) in a given document.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The documents to analyze.

post.description: The API returns a list of general named entities in a given document. For the list of supported entity types, check Supported Named Entity Recognition (NER) entity categories.

parameters.name: model-version
parameters.description: (Optional) This value indicates which model will be used for scoring. If a model-version is not specified, the API should default to the latest, non-preview version.

parameters.name: showStats
parameters.description: (Optional) if set to true, response will contain input and document level statistics.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Collection of documents to analyze.

200.description: A successful call results in a list of recognized entities returned for each valid document.

post.description: The API returns a list of recognized entities with links to a well-known knowledge base. See the language support for the list of supported languages.

parameters.name: model-version
parameters.description: (Optional) This value indicates which model will be used for scoring. If a model-version is not specified, the API should default to the latest, non-preview version.

parameters.name: showStats
parameters.description: (Optional) if set to true, response will contain input and document level statistics.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Collection of documents to analyze.

200.description: A successful call results in a list of recognized entities with links to a well-known knowledge base returned for each valid document

post.description: The API returns a list of strings denoting the key phrases in the input text. See the Language support for Key Phrase Extraction for the list of supported languages.

parameters.name: model-version
parameters.description: (Optional) This value indicates which model will be used for scoring. If a model-version is not specified, the API should default to the latest, non-preview version.

parameters.name: showStats
parameters.description: (Optional) if set to true, response will contain input and document level statistics.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Collection of documents to analyze. Documents can now contain a language field to indicate the text language

200.description: A successful response results in 0 or more key phrases identified in each valid document

post.description: The API returns the detected language and a numeric score between 0 and 1. Scores close to 1 indicate 100% certainty that the identified language is true. See the Language support for Language Detection for the list of supported languages.

parameters.name: model-version
parameters.description: (Optional) This value indicates which model will be used for scoring. If a model-version is not specified, the API should default to the latest, non-preview version.

parameters.name: showStats
parameters.description: (Optional) if set to true, response will contain input and document level statistics.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Collection of documents to analyze.

200.description: A successful call results in the detected language with the highest probability for each valid document

post.description: The API returns a sentiment prediction, as well as sentiment scores for each sentiment class (Positive, Negative, and Neutral) for the document and each sentence within it. See the Sentiment Analysis and Opinion Mining language support for the list of supported languages.

parameters.name: model-version
parameters.description: (Optional) This value indicates which model will be used for scoring. If a model-version is not specified, the API should default to the latest, non-preview version.

parameters.name: showStats
parameters.description: (Optional) if set to true, response will contain input and document level statistics.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Collection of documents to analyze.

200.description: A successful call results in a document sentiment prediction, as well as sentiment scores for each sentiment class (Positive, Negative, and Neutral)

post.description: The API returns a list of general named entities in a given document. For the list of supported entity types, check Supported Named Entity Recognition (NER) entity categories.

parameters.name: subdomain
parameters.description: Azure subdomain or geographic region (e.g. westus)

200.description: A successful call results in a list of recognized entities returned for each valid document.

post.description: The API returns a list of general named entities in a given document. For the list of supported entity types, check Supported Named Entity Recognition (NER) entity categories.

200.description: A successful call results in a list of recognized entities returned for each valid document.

post.description: The API returns a list of entities with personal information (\"SSN\", \"Bank Account\" etc) in the document. For the list of supported entity types, check Supported Personally Identifiable Information (PII) entity categories. See the Supported languages in Azure Cognitive Service for Language for the list of supported languages.

parameters.name: subdomain
parameters.description: Azure subdomain or geographic region (e.g. westus)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: (Optional) if specified, will set the PII domain to include only a subset of the entity categories. Possible values include: 'PHI', 'none'.

200.description: A successful call results in a list of entities containing personal information returned for each valid document

post.description: The API returns a list of entities with personal information (\"SSN\", \"Bank Account\" etc) in the document. For the list of supported entity types, check Supported Personally Identifiable Information (PII) entity categories. See the Supported languages in Azure Cognitive Service for Language for the list of supported languages.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: (Optional) if specified, will set the PII domain to include only a subset of the entity categories. Possible values include: 'PHI', 'none'.

200.description: A successful call results in a list of entities containing personal information returned for each valid document

post.description: The API returns a list of recognized entities with links to a well known knowledge base. See the language support for the list of supported languages.

parameters.name: subdomain
parameters.description: Azure subdomain or geographic region (e.g. westus)

200.description: A successful call results in a list of recognized entities with links to a well known knowledge base returned for each valid document

post.description: The API returns a list of recognized entities with links to a well known knowledge base. See the language support for the list of supported languages.

200.description: A successful call results in a list of recognized entities with links to a well known knowledge base returned for each valid document

post.description: The API returns a list of strings denoting the key phrases in the input text. See the Language support for Key Phrase Extraction for the list of supported languages.

parameters.name: subdomain
parameters.description: Azure subdomain or geographic region (e.g. westus)

200.description: A successful response results in 0 or more key phrases identified in each valid document

post.description: The API returns a list of strings denoting the key phrases in the input text. See the Language support for Key Phrase Extraction for the list of supported languages.

200.description: A successful response results in 0 or more key phrases identified in each valid document

post.description: The API returns the detected language and a numeric score between 0 and 1. Scores close to 1 indicate 100% certainty that the identified language is true. See the Language support for Language Detection for the list of supported languages.

parameters.name: subdomain
parameters.description: Azure subdomain or geographic region (e.g. westus)

200.description: A successful call results in the detected language with the highest probability for each valid document

post.description: The API returns the detected language and a numeric score between 0 and 1. Scores close to 1 indicate 100% certainty that the identified language is true. See the Language support for Language Detection for the list of supported languages.

200.description: A successful call results in the detected language with the highest probability for each valid document

post.description: The API returns a detailed sentiment analysis for the input text. The analysis is done in multiple levels of granularity, start from the a document level, down to sentence and key terms (targets and assessments).

parameters.name: subdomain
parameters.description: Azure subdomain or geographic region (e.g. westus)

parameters.name: opinionMining
parameters.description: (Optional) if set to true, response will contain not only sentiment prediction but also opinion mining (aspect-based sentiment analysis) results.

200.description: A successful call results in a document sentiment prediction, as well as sentiment scores for each sentiment class (Positive, Negative, and Neutral)

post.description: The API returns a detailed sentiment analysis for the input text. The analysis is done in multiple levels of granularity, start from the a document level, down to sentence and key terms (targets and assessments).

parameters.name: opinionMining
parameters.description: (Optional) if set to true, response will contain not only sentiment prediction but also opinion mining (aspect-based sentiment analysis) results.

200.description: A successful call results in a document sentiment prediction, as well as sentiment scores for each sentiment class (Positive, Negative, and Neutral)

get.summary: Get the subdomain of the connection

post.description: Analyzes the input conversation utterance.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

post.description: Submit a collection of conversations for analysis. Specify one or more unique tasks to be executed.

parameters.description: The collection of conversations to analyze and one or more tasks to execute.
parameters.name: body

202.description: A successful call results with an Operation-Location header used to check the status of the analysis job.

get.description: Get the status of an analysis job. A job may consist of one or more tasks. Once all tasks are succeeded, the job will transition to the succeeded state and results will be available for each task.

202.description: A successful call results with an Operation-Location header used to check the status of the analysis job.

get.description: Get the status of an analysis job.  A job may consist of one or more tasks.  Once all tasks are succeeded, the job will transition to the succeeded state and results will be available for each task.

displayName.description: Optional display name for the analysis job.

conversationItems.description: Ordered list of transcript conversation items in the conversation.

language.description: The language of the conversation item in BCP-47 format.

TranscriptConversationItem.description: Additional properties for supporting transcript conversation.

id.description: The ID of a conversation item.

participantId.description: The participant ID of a conversation item.

language.description: The override language of a conversation item in BCP 47 language representation.

itn.description: Inverse Text Normalization representation of input. The inverse-text-normalized form is the recognized text from Microsofts Speech to Text API, with phone numbers, numbers, abbreviations, and other transformations applied.

maskedItn.description: The Inverse Text Normalized format with profanity masking applied.

text.description: The display form of the recognized text from speech to text API, with punctuation and capitalization added.

lexical.description: The lexical form of the recognized text from speech to text API with the actual words recognized.

audioTimings.description: The list of word level audio timing information

WordLevelTiming.description: Word level timing information generated by the speech to text API. The words in this object should have 1:1 correspondence with the 'lexical' input to allow for audio redaction.

offset.description: Offset from start of speech audio, in ticks. 1 tick = 100 ns.

duration.description: Duration of word articulation, in ticks. 1 tick = 100 ns.

displayName.description: Optional display name for the analysis job.

conversationItems.description: Ordered list of text conversation items in the conversation.

language.description: The language of the conversation item in BCP-47 format.

ConversationalPIITextConversationItem.description: The text modality of an input conversation.

id.description: The ID of a conversation item.

participantId.description: The participant ID of a conversation item.

language.description: The override language of a conversation item in BCP 47 language representation.

ConversationalPIITextTask.description: Task definition for a PII redaction in conversations.

ConversationPIITextTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for a Conversational PII detection and redaction task.

displayName.description: Optional display name for the analysis job.

conversationItems.description: Ordered list of text conversation items in the conversation.

language.description: The language of the conversation item in BCP-47 format.

ConversationalSummarizationTextConversat.description: The text modality of an input conversation.

id.description: The ID of a conversation item.

participantId.description: The participant ID of a conversation item.

language.description: The override language of a conversation item in BCP 47 language representation.

ConversationalPIITranscriptTask.description: Task definition for a PII redaction in conversations.

ConversationalPIILROTaskKind.description: Enumeration of supported analysis tasks on a collection of conversations.

ConversationalPIITranscriptTaskParameter.description: Supported parameters for a Conversational PII detection and redaction task.

includeAudioRedaction.description: Flag to indicate if audio redaction is requested. By default audio redaction will not be performed.

redactionSource.description: For transcript conversations, this parameter provides information regarding which content type (ITN, Text, Lexical, Masked ITN) should be used for entity detection. The details of the entities detected - like the offset, length and the text itself - will correspond to the text type selected here.

ConversationPIICategories.description: Describes the PII categories to return for detection. If not provided, 'default' categories will be returned which will vary with the language.

TranscriptContentType.description: Enumeration of supported transcript content types.

ConversationalSummarizationLROTaskKind.description: Enumeration of supported analysis tasks on a collection of conversations.

ConversationSummarizationTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for an conversational summarization task.

ConversationalPIITranscriptJobState.description: Contains the status of the analyze conversations job submitted along with related statistics.

inProgress.description: Count of tasks in progress currently.

total.description: Total count of tasks submitted as part of the job.

ConversationRequestStatistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the request payload.

documentsCount.description: Number of documents submitted in the request.

validDocumentsCount.description: Number of valid documents. This excludes empty, over-size limit or non-supported languages documents.

erroneousDocumentsCount.description: Number of invalid documents. This includes empty, over-size limit or non-supported languages documents.

transactionsCount.description: Number of transactions for the request.

conversationsCount.description: Number of conversations submitted in the request.

validConversationsCount.description: Number of conversations documents. This excludes empty, over-size limit or non-supported languages documents.

erroneousConversationsCount.description: Number of invalid documents. This includes empty, over-size limit or non-supported languages documents.

ConversationalPIITranscriptResult.description: Result from the personally identifiable information detection and redaction operation performed on a list of conversations.

lastUpdateDateTime.description: The last updated time in UTC for the task.

status.description: The status of the task at the mentioned last update time.

ConversationalPIIResultsKind.description: Enumeration of supported Conversation Analysis task results.

ConversationPIITranscriptResults.description: The result from PII detection and redaction operation for each conversation.

conversationItems.description: Enumeration of PII detection and redaction operation results for all the conversation items in a conversation.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

InputError.description: Contains details of errors encountered during a job execution.

InputWarning.description: Contains details of warnings encountered during a job execution.

targetRef.description: A JSON pointer reference indicating the target object.

ConversationStatistics.description: If showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the conversation payload.

transactionsCount.description: Number of text units for the request.

ConversationalPIITranscriptRedactedTrans.description: The transcript content response generated by the service with all necessary personally identifiable information redacted.

itn.description: The redacted output for inverse text normalized format input.

maskedItn.description: The redacted output for masked inverse text normalized format input.

text.description: The redacted output for text (Microsoft's Speech to Text 'display') format input.

lexical.description: The redacted output for lexical format input.

audioTimings.description: The list of redacted audio segments.

offset.description: Offset from start of speech audio, in ticks. 1 tick = 100 ns.

duration.description: Duration of word articulation, in ticks. 1 tick = 100 ns.

ConversationalPIITextJobState.description: Contains the status of the analyze conversations job submitted along with related statistics.

inProgress.description: Count of tasks in progress currently.

total.description: Total count of tasks submitted as part of the job.

ConversationalPIITextResult.description: Result from the personally identifiable information detection and redaction operation performed on a list of conversations.

lastUpdateDateTime.description: The last updated time in UTC for the task.

status.description: The status of the task at the mentioned last update time.

ConversationPIITextResults.description: The result from PII detection and redaction operation for each conversation.

conversationItems.description: Enumeration of PII detection and redaction operation results for all the conversation items in a conversation.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

ConversationalPIITranscriptRedactedTextC.description: The transcript content response generated by the service with all necessary personally identifiable information redacted.

text.description: The redacted output for text (Microsoft's Speech to Text 'display') format input.

AnalyzeConversationSummarizationJobState.description: Contains the status of the analyze conversations job submitted along with related statistics.

inProgress.description: Count of tasks in progress currently.

total.description: Total count of tasks submitted as part of the job.

AnalyzeConversationSummarizationResult.description: Result for the summarization task on the conversation.

lastUpdateDateTime.description: The last updated time in UTC for the task.

status.description: The status of the task at the mentioned last update time.

ConversationalSummarizationResultsKind.description: Enumeration of supported Conversation Analysis task results.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

InnerErrorModel.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

LanguageTaskParameters.description: Base parameters object for a text analysis task.

LanguagePreBuiltTaskParameters_05_01.description: Parameters object for a text analysis task using pre-built models.

LanguagePreBuiltTaskParameters_10_01_pre.description: Parameters object for a text analysis task using pre-built models.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

LanguageCustomTaskParameters.description: Parameters object for a text analysis task using custom models.

projectName.description: This field indicates the project name for the model.

deploymentName.description: This field indicates the deployment name for the model.

projectName.description: This field indicates the project name for the model.

deploymentName.description: This field indicates the deployment name for the model.

LanguageCustomEntitiesTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for a Custom Entities task.

projectName.description: This field indicates the project name for the model.

deploymentName.description: This field indicates the deployment name for the model.

LanguageCustomEntitiesLROTask.description: Use custom models to ease the process of information extraction from unstructured documents like contracts or financial documents

kind.description: Enumeration of supported long-running Text Analysis tasks.

LanguageCustomSingleLabelClassificationT.description: Supported parameters for a Custom Single Classification task.

projectName.description: This field indicates the project name for the model.

deploymentName.description: This field indicates the deployment name for the model.

LanguageCustomSingleLabelClassificationL.description: Use custom models to classify text into single label taxonomy

kind.description: Enumeration of supported long-running Text Analysis tasks.

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0 and 1 of the recognized class.

LanguageCustomMultiLabelClassificationTa.description: Supported parameters for a Custom Multi Classification task.

projectName.description: This field indicates the project name for the model.

deploymentName.description: This field indicates the deployment name for the model.

LanguageCustomMultiLabelClassificationLR.description: Use custom models to classify text into multi label taxonomy

kind.description: Enumeration of supported long-running Text Analysis tasks.

detectedLanguage.description: If 'language' is set to 'auto' for the document in the request this field will contain a 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of the language detected for this document.

statistics.description: if showStats=true was specified in the request this field will contain information about the document payload.

LanguageHealthcareTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for a Healthcare task.

kind.description: Enumeration of supported long-running Text Analysis tasks.

text.description: Entity text as appears in the request.

offset.description: Start position for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the offset returned.

length.description: Length for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the length returned.

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0 and 1 of the extracted entity.

name.description: Preferred name for the entity. Example: 'histologically' would have a 'name' of 'histologic'.

links.description: Entity references in known data sources.

LanguageHealthcareRelation.description: Every relation is an entity graph of a certain relationType, where all entities are connected and have specific roles within the relation context.

relationType.description: Type of relation. Examples include: `DosageOfMedication` or 'FrequencyOfMedication', etc.

conditionality.description: Describes any conditionality on the entity.

certainty.description: Describes the entities certainty and polarity.

association.description: Describes if the entity is the subject of the text or if it describes someone else.

ref.description: Reference link object, using a JSON pointer RFC 6901 (URI Fragment Identifier Representation), pointing to the entity .

role.description: Role of entity in the relationship. For example: 'CD20-positive diffuse large B-cell lymphoma' has the following entities with their roles in parenthesis:  CD20 (GeneOrProtein), Positive (Expression), diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (Diagnosis).

dataSource.description: Entity Catalog. Examples include: UMLS, CHV, MSH, etc.

id.description: Entity id in the given source catalog.

LanguageSentimentAnalysisTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for a Sentiment Analysis task.

LanguageSentimentAnalysisLROTask.description: An object representing the task definition for a Sentiment Analysis task.

kind.description: Enumeration of supported long-running Text Analysis tasks.

sentiment.description: Predicted sentiment for document (Negative, Neutral, Positive, or Mixed).

confidenceScores.description: Document level sentiment confidence scores between 0 and 1 for each sentiment class.

LanguageSentimentConfidenceScorePerLabel.description: Represents the confidence scores between 0 and 1 across all sentiment classes: positive, neutral, negative.

sentiment.description: The predicted Sentiment for the sentence.

confidenceScores.description: The sentiment confidence score between 0 and 1 for the sentence for all classes.

offset.description: The sentence offset from the start of the document.

targets.description: The array of sentence targets for the sentence.

assessments.description: The array of assessments for the sentence.

confidenceScores.description: Target sentiment confidence scores for the target in the sentence.

offset.description: The target offset from the start of the sentence.

relations.description: The array of either assessment or target objects which is related to the target.

confidenceScores.description: Assessment sentiment confidence scores in the sentence.

offset.description: The assessment offset from the start of the sentence.

isNegated.description: The indicator representing if the assessment is negated.

relationType.description: The type related to the target.

ref.description: The JSON pointer indicating the linked object.

LanguageTargetConfidenceScoreLabel.description: Represents the confidence scores across all sentiment classes: positive and negative.

LanguageEntitiesTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for an Entity Recognition task.

LanguageEntitiesLROTask.description: An object representing the task definition for an Entities Recognition task.

kind.description: Enumeration of supported long-running Text Analysis tasks.

text.description: Entity text as appears in the request.

offset.description: Start position for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the offset returned.

length.description: Length for the entity text. Use of different 'stringIndexType' values can affect the length returned.

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0 and 1 of the extracted entity.

LanguageEntityLinkingTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for an Entity Linking task.

LanguageEntityLinkingLROTask.description: An object representing the task definition for an Entity Linking task.

kind.description: Enumeration of supported long-running Text Analysis tasks.

entities.description: Recognized well known entities in the document.

matches.description: List of instances this entity appears in the text.

language.description: Language used in the data source.

id.description: Unique identifier of the recognized entity from the data source.

url.description: URL for the entity's page from the data source.

dataSource.description: Data source used to extract entity linking, such as Wiki/Bing etc.

bingId.description: Bing Entity Search API unique identifier of the recognized entity.

confidenceScore.description: If a well known item is recognized, a decimal number denoting the confidence level between 0 and 1 will be returned.

text.description: Entity text as appears in the request.

offset.description: Start position for the entity match text.

length.description: Length for the entity match text.

LanguagePiiTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for a PII Entities Recognition task.

LanguagePiiLROTask.description: An object representing the task definition for a PII Entities Recognition task.

kind.description: Enumeration of supported long-running Text Analysis tasks.

LanguagePiiDomain.description: The PII domain used for PII Entity Recognition.

values.name: phi
values.description: Indicates that entities in the Personal Health Information domain should be redacted.

values.name: none
values.description: Indicates that no domain is specified.

LanguagePiiCategories.description: (Optional) describes the PII categories to return

LanguageKeyPhraseTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for a Key Phrase Extraction task.

documentsCount.description: Number of documents submitted in the request.

erroneousDocumentsCount.description: Number of invalid documents. This includes empty, over-size limit or non-supported languages documents.

LanguageMultiLanguageInput.description: Contains an input document to be analyzed by the service.

language.description: (Optional) This is the 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English; "es" for Spanish etc. If not set, use "en" for English as default.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

LanguageInnerErrorModel.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Language.description: Language of the text records. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en" for English; "es" for Spanish etc. If not set, use "en" for English as default.

LanguageStringIndexType.description: Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets.  Defaults to Text Elements (Graphemes) according to Unicode v8.0.0. For additional information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets.

values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to TextElements (Graphemes and Grapheme clusters) confirming to the Unicode 8.0.0 standard. Use this option if your application is written in .Net Framework or .Net Core and you will be using StringInfo.
Returned offset and length values will correspond to Unicode code points. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Python.
Returned offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.

questions.description: List of questions associated with the answer.

confidenceScore.description: Answer confidence score, value ranges from 0 to 1.

metadata.description: Metadata associated with the answer, useful to categorize or filter question answers.

answerSpan.description: Answer span object of QnA with respect to user's question.

isContextOnly.description: To mark if a prompt is relevant only with a previous question or not. If true, do not include this QnA as search result for queries without context; otherwise, if false, ignores context and includes this QnA in search result.

prompts.description: List of prompts associated with the answer.

displayOrder.description: Index of the prompt - used in ordering of the prompts.

qnaId.description: QnA ID corresponding to the prompt.

displayText.description: Text displayed to represent a follow up question prompt.

confidenceScore.description: Predicted score of answer span, value ranges from 0 to 1.

offset.description: The answer span offset from the start of answer.

length.description: The length of the answer span.

LanguageAnswersOptions.description: Parameters to query a knowledge base.

qnaId.description: Exact QnA ID to fetch from the knowledge base, this field takes priority over question.

question.description: User question to query against the knowledge base.

top.description: Max number of answers to be returned for the question.

confidenceScoreThreshold.description: Minimum threshold score for answers, value ranges from 0 to 1.

context.description: Context object with previous QnA's information.

rankerType.description: Type of ranker to be used.

filters.description: Filter QnAs based on given metadata list and knowledge base sources.

answerSpanRequest.description: To configure Answer span prediction feature.

includeUnstructuredSources.description: (Optional) Flag to enable Query over Unstructured Sources.

LanguageKnowledgeBaseAnswerContext.description: Context object with previous QnA's information.

previousQnaId.description: Previous turn top answer result QnA ID.

logicalOperation.description: Logical operation used to join metadata filter with source filter.

LanguageMetadataFilter.description: Find QnAs that are associated with the given list of metadata.

logicalOperation.description: Operation used to join metadata filters.

LanguageMetadataRecord.description: Object to provide the key value pair for each metadata.

key.description: Metadata Key from Metadata dictionary used in the QnA.

value.description: Metadata Value from Metadata dictionary used in the QnA.

LanguageSourceFilter.description: Find QnAs that are associated with any of the given list of sources in knowledge base.

LanguageLogicalOperationKind.description: Set to 'OR' or 'AND' for using corresponding logical operation.

LanguageShortAnswerOptions.description: To configure Answer span prediction feature.

enable.description: Enable or disable Answer Span prediction.

confidenceScoreThreshold.description: Minimum threshold score required to include an answer span, value ranges from 0 to 1.

topAnswersWithSpan.description: Number of Top answers to be considered for span prediction from 1 to 10.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the subdomain.

documents.description: The set of documents to process as part of this batch.

value.description: The Subtype of an extracted entity type.

ListKey.description: The list key extra data kind.

key.description: The canonical form of the extracted entity.

BaseResolution.description: The abstract base class for entity resolutions.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

AgeResolution.description: Represents the Age entity resolution model.

VolumeResolution.description: Represents the volume entity resolution model.

SpeedResolution.description: Represents the speed entity resolution model.

AreaResolution.description: Represents the area entity resolution model.

LengthResolution.description: Represents the length entity resolution model.

InformationResolution.description: Represents the information (data) entity resolution model.

TemperatureResolution.description: Represents the temperature entity resolution model.

WeightResolution.description: Represents the weight entity resolution model.

CurrencyResolution.description: Represents the currency entity resolution model.

ISO4217.description: The alphabetic code based on another ISO standard, ISO 3166, which lists the codes for country names. The first two letters of the ISO 4217 three-letter code are the same as the code for the country name, and, where possible, the third letter corresponds to the first letter of the currency name.

value.description: The money amount captured in the extracted entity

unit.description: The unit of the amount captured in the extracted entity

DateTimeResolution.description: A resolution for datetime entity instances.

value.description: The actual time that the extracted text denote.

NumberResolution.description: A resolution for numeric entity instances.

numberKind.description: The type of the extracted number entity.

value.description: A numeric representation of what the extracted text denotes.

OrdinalResolution.description: A resolution for ordinal numbers entity instances.

offset.description: The offset With respect to the reference (e.g., offset = -1 in "show me the second to last"

relativeTo.description: The reference point that the ordinal number denotes.

value.description: A simple arithmetic expression that the ordinal denotes.

TemporalSpanResolution.description: represents the resolution of a date and/or time span.

duration.description: An optional duration value formatted based on the ISO 8601 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations)

NumericRangeResolution.description: represents the resolution of numeric intervals.

rangeKind.description: The kind of range that the resolution object represents.

minimum.description: The beginning value of  the interval.

maximum.description: The ending value of the interval.

TextSpanResolution.description: A resolution that captures textspan matches.

TemporalModifier.description: An optional modifier of a date/time instance.

TimeExpression.description: An extended ISO 8601 date/time representation as described in (https://github.com/Microsoft/Recognizers-Text/blob/master/Patterns/English/English-DateTime.yaml)

OrchestrationPrediction.description: This represents the prediction result of an Orchestration project.

intents.description: A dictionary that contains all intents. A key is an intent name and a value is its confidence score and target type. The top intent's value also contains the actual response from the target project.

topIntent.description: The intent with the highest score.

targetProjectKind.description: This discriminator property specifies the type of the target project that returns the response.

apiVersion.description: The API version used to call a target service.

confidenceScore.description: The prediction score and it ranges from 0.0 to 1.0.

values.name: Offset
values.description: Indicates that results should be sorted in order of appearance in the text.

values.name: Rank
values.description: Indicates that results should be sorted in order of importance (i.e. rank score) according to the model.

sentences.description: A ranked list of sentences representing the extracted summary.

detectedLanguage.description: If 'language' is set to 'auto' for the document in the request this field will contain a 2 letter ISO 639-1 representation of the language detected for this document.

rankScore.description: A double value representing the relevance of the sentence within the summary. Higher values indicate higher importance.

offset.description: The sentence offset from the start of the document, based on the value of the parameter StringIndexType.

values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to TextElements (Graphemes and Grapheme clusters) confirming to the Unicode 8.0.0 standard. Use this option if your application is written in .Net Framework or .Net Core and you will be using StringInfo.
Returned offset and length values will correspond to Unicode code points. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Python.

ShowStats.name: showStats
ShowStats.description: (Optional) if set to true, response will contain request and document level statistics.

LoggingOptOut.name: loggingOptOut
LoggingOptOut.description: (Optional) If set to true, you opt-out of having your text input logged for troubleshooting. By default, Azure Cognitive Service for Language logs your input text for 48 hours, solely to allow for troubleshooting issues in providing you with the Azure Cognitive Service for Language natural language processing functions. Setting this parameter to true, disables input logging and may limit our ability to remediate issues that occur.  Please see Cognitive Services Compliance and Privacy notes at https://aka.ms/cs-compliance for additional details, and Microsoft Responsible AI principles at https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/ai/responsible-ai.

ModelVersion.name: model-version
ModelVersion.description: (Optional) This value indicates which model will be used for scoring. If a model-version is not specified, the API should default to the latest, non-preview version.

LanguageInput.name: input
LanguageInput.description: Collection of documents to analyze for language endpoint.
